description: Nuro's autonomous vehicles will take to the streets as early as 2021.
title: Nuro set to be California's first driverless delivery service
title_page: Nuro set to be California's first driverless delivery service - BBC News
maintext: The vehicle has an egg-shaped frame that is smaller than most cars in the US. It also has two temperature-controlled compartments for deliveries. Doors raise up to reveal the items once a code has been entered by the recipient.
